201.description: Returned when the resource created success.

204.description: Returned when the resource deleted success.

400.description: Returned when the request data validate failed.

401.description: Returned when the user does not authentication.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to access the resource.

404.description: Returned when the resource not found.

429.description: Returned when request too many in a unit time.
